org.apache.portals.bridges.struts.taglib
Class ELLinkTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
          org.apache.struts.taglib.html.BaseHandlerTag
              org.apache.struts.taglib.html.LinkTag
                  org.apache.strutsel.taglib.html.ELLinkTag
                      org.apache.portals.bridges.struts.taglib.ELLinkTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class ELLinkTag
extends org.apache.strutsel.taglib.html.ELLinkTag

Supports the Struts html-el:link tag to be used within a Portlet context.

Version:
$Id: ELLinkTag.java 517068 2007-03-12 01:44:37Z ate $
Author:
Ate Douma
See Also:

Field Detail

urlType

protected PortletURLTypes.URLType urlType
Indicates which type of a url must be generated: action, render or resource.

If not specified, the type will be determined by PortletURLTypes.getType(String)

.

private String actionURL

Method Detail

getActionURL

public String getActionURL()
Returns:
"true" if an ActionURL must be rendered

setActionURL

public void setActionURL(String actionURL)
Render an ActionURL when set to "true"

Supports jstl expression language.

Parameters:
actionURL - when (evaluated to) "true" renders an ActionURL

calculateURL

protected String calculateURL()
                       throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Generates a PortletURL or a ResourceURL for the link when in the context of a PortletRequest, otherwise the default behaviour is maintained.

Returns:
the link url
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException - if a JSP exception has occurred

public int doStartTag()
               throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

evaluateExpressions

private void evaluateExpressions()
                          throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Resolve the actionURL, renderURL and resourceURL attributes using the Struts JSTL expression evaluation engine (EvalHelper).

Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException - if a JSP exception has occurred

public void release()
